SEARCH
Package com.Dao

Class DaoRegisterLogin

java.lang.Object
com.Dao.DaoRegisterLogin
public class DaoRegisterLogin extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for user registration and login operations. This class handles interactions with the database for user details, credentials, and contact information.

It includes methods for registering users, validating login credentials, updating user details, and managing contact information.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sahana
